summary: This is an email chain from June 4, 2021, between FBI personnel coordinating the handoff of a drive containing material related to Maxwell. It shows internal logistics for evidence transfer in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Sunny
persons.context: Coordinates receiving a drive containing material for Maxwell from Mandy, indicating they are a paralegal specialist involved in the case logistics.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: Possesses a drive with material for Maxwell and is asked to hand it over to Sunny; appears to be an FBI Special Agent at the New York Field Office.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: Asked Sunny to reach out to coordinate receiving the drive from Mandy, suggesting a supervisory or coordinating role in the evidence transfer.

connections.description: Coordinating the handoff of a drive containing material for Maxwell, indicating a working relationship on case logistics.
Maurene asked Sunny to coordinate receiving the drive, suggesting a directive or supervisory relationship.

events.title: Coordination for Maxwell Drive Handoff
events.description: FBI personnel coordinate the transfer of a drive containing material related to Maxwell, with Sunny offering to receive it from Mandy.

locations: 1SA (likely referring to 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, the address of the FBI New York Field Office)
keyFacts: An email chain dated June 4, 2021, shows FBI personnel coordinating the handoff of a drive containing material for Maxwell.
The drive is in the possession of FBI Special Agent Mandy and is to be transferred to Paralegal Specialist Sunny.
The coordination was initiated at the request of Maurene, indicating an organized evidence transfer process within the investigation.
